data.name: Aero Tales Online: The World - Anime MMORPG
data.detailed_description:
Aero Tales Online is a new free-to-play Anime MMORPG featuring fantastic PvP and PvE features. You will find yourself in a mysterious story of the Key of Skylight. Choose your side, customize your character and enjoy the journey of Aero World!

About Game

  • Combat:
    You can play in action-combat mode or tab-target combat mode. Show your difference with many combo combinations and gameplay styles!

  • Customization:
    Special combat style and items for each class. Choose your side, customize your character and join the game with your unique character.

  • Events:
    Many events await you every day. Multiple sudden wars, ranked arena battles, raids and more!

  • Exploration:
    After a certain level you can fly through the whole Aero World and explore never seen places.

  • Alternatives:
    There are also many activities you can do apart from war and quests. Decorate your house, farm, impress people with your musical talent or marry your partner. There is no limit to what can be done in this world.

  • Play for free:
    Aero Tales Online is completely free to play.

data.short_description: Aero Tales Online is a new free-to-play Anime MMORPG featuring fantastic PvP and PvE features. You will find yourself in a mysterious story of the Key of Skylight. Choose your side, customize your character and enjoy the journey of Aero World!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: Pentium 4, Dual Core.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 7600 or equivalents
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4, Dual Core 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or equivalents
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
